sentences.en: Bad diction marred the effectiveness of his speech.
sentences.cn: 措词不当影响了他演说的效果.

sentences.en: Don't conceal the poverty of thought by the eccentric diction.
sentences.cn: 不要用这些怪僻的词藻来掩饰思想的贫乏.

sentences.en: Her carriage and diction were always faultless.
sentences.cn: 她的风度举止、遣词用字总是无可挑剔.

sentences.en: Her conception of the character was as heavy and uncompromising as her diction.
sentences.cn: 她把这个人物设想得就象她念台词的风格一样,是既沉重而又毫不妥协的.

sentences.en: His diction is noted for its freshness and vividness.
sentences.cn: 他以用字遣词清新生动见长.

sentences.en: His diction was appropriate to a religious subject.
sentences.cn: 他说话的措词带有宗教的意味.

sentences.en: I like this article vey much because of its rich diction.
sentences.cn: 这篇散文的文词非常华美,我很喜欢.

sentences.en: Now I got to worry about my diction, too?
sentences.cn: 我想我现在也得注意一下我的措辞, 是 吗 ?

sentences.en: One last time and this time I want crisp diction.
sentences.cn: 最后一次,这次我要的是清楚的发音.

sentences.en: Solid English fundamental knowledge contains native - like accent, standard grammar and professional diction.
sentences.cn: 夯实英语基础知识包括语音的纯正性 、 语法的规范性、遣词造句的专业性等.

sentences.en: The effectiveness of your speech depends on your diction.
sentences.cn: 你的演说效果在于你的用字是否得当.

sentences.en: The original was all her own - her own happy thoughts and gentle diction.
sentences.cn: 原信全是她写的,她的巧妙构思,她的文雅措词.

sentences.en: The original was all her own, her own happy thoughts and gentle diction.
sentences.cn: 原稿由她一手拟定, 出自她自己的高见和她自己的文雅措辞.

trans.tran_cn: 发音法，措词，用词，文辞，措辞
trans.tran_en: the choice and use of words and phrases to express meaning, especially in literature
